extension.summary: Nakamori enables you to browse your JMM collection within Kodi.
extension.description: Nakamori enables you to browse your JMM collection within Kodi without needing to re-import it, any way. Thanks to this approach, you are still able to manage your JMM collection and use its organized data in Kodi.

extension.disclaimer: Remember to change IP address in settings if your JMM Server is not on the same computer as Kodi.
